author: itv.com
title: Major improvements for four Southampton housing estates | Meridian
text:
There will be major improvements in Thornhill Credit: Southampton City Council More than 1,500 homes in Southampton will be improved as part of a Â£27m scheme to cut energy use.
Southampton City Council's new energy efficiency project will affect four housing estates.
The improvements will be carried out in Thornhill, Shirley, St Mary's and Maybush.
The scheme is being delivered by Southampton City Council and British Gas.
Last updated Fri 18 Sep 2015 Technology
